doc:
Ron Dean https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ron_Dean 0 Ron Dean is an American film and television actor. He appeared in such movies as Risky Business, The Breakfast Club, Cocktail, The Babe, The Fugitive, The Client, and The Dark Knight. He is known for often playing detectives and other law-enforcement characters, most notably Det. Marion Zeke Crumb in the television show Early Edition. Ron_Dean is an_American_film_and_television_actor . He appeared in such_movies as Risky_Business , The_Breakfast_Club , Cocktail , The_Babe , The_Fugitive , The_Client , and The_Dark_Knight . He is_known for often_playing detectives and other_law-enforcement_characters , most_notably Det._Marion_Zeke_Crumb in the_television_show_Early_Edition .
